appinfo_list.name: Developer
appinfo_list.value: Easy Learning, Coloring your Life - EZ Joy,Inc

app_descript:
Paint By Number üé®

Brief: Unleash your inner artist with Paint By Number, an app designed to bring the joys of painting to your fingertips without the traditional mess. This pixel art coloring and drawing puzzle game transforms the complex craft into an effortlessly enjoyable experience. With a palette of features to simplify the process, enjoy how Paint By Number turns your digital canvas into a masterpiece. Whether you're a seasoned painter or just looking for a relaxing pastime, this app offers a creative outlet that's both engaging and accessible.

Core Features:

  • Convenience at Your Fingertips üñåÔ∏è: Paint across multiple devices seamlessly, saying goodbye to pencils and paper.
  • User-Friendly Coloring üîç: Experience the simplicity of painting with handy hints for those tough spots.
  • Instant Sharing üåê: With just one tap, share your artwork with friends and family across social platforms.
  • Diverse Selection üåà: Choose from a vast collection of images to find the one that speaks to your soul.

Pros:

  • Cross-Platform Syncing üë•: Start on one device and continue on another without losing your progress.
  • No Art Supplies Needed üö´üé®: Dive into painting without any physical tools; perfect for on-the-go creativity.
  • Social Connectivity üí¨: Easily connect with others by showcasing your work online.
  • Variety as Spice üìö: Never run out of choices with an extensive library of pictures to color.

Cons:

  • Permission Requirements üîê: Access to your photos, media, and files is necessary, which may be a concern for privacy-focused users.
  • In-App Purchases üí∞: While the app itself is free, some features require payment.
  • Membership Costs üè∑Ô∏è: Recurring charges for memberships post-trial could add up if you're budget-conscious.
  • Connectivity Dependency üì∂: An internet connection is needed to sync across devices and share your creations.

Price:

  • Paint By Number is free to download with optional in-app purchases.
  • Memberships are available following a 7-day free trial, with weekly rates at $3.99, a monthly subscription at $9.99, and an annual option at $69.99.

Community:

  • Official Site: Visit the official website for updates and support.
  • YouTube Channel: Find tutorials, tips, and community highlights on their YouTube channel.
  • Popular YouTubers: Watch related content creators for inspiration and techniques.
  • Instagram: Check out the vibrant community showing off their artistic creations.
  • Twitter: Follow for the latest news, user art showcases, and community interactions.
  • Discord: Join the conversation with fellow artists and colorists on Discord.
  • Facebook: Like and follow for updates, community events, and shared artwork.
  • TikTok: Discover short, engaging content and creative ideas regarding the app.
  • Reddit: Engage with subreddits dedicated to coloring and digital art collaborations.
  • Fandom Wiki: Delve deeper into the app's features, tips, and user guides on the fandom wiki site.
